black.content: Before swallowing his pride and a cyanide pill, Adolf whispered to Eva, "Sorry about _ ".
Leni Riefenstahl's last movie was called Triumph of _ .

white: An orgasm so powerful you travel back in time and jizz in Hitler's face.
